title: Glorious Residencies
details:
Proposed Glorious residencies apartment complex will be developed as a mixed development with residential apartments and commercial complex in the basement. This will be comprised with 11 apartment units per floor, with an option of combining two units and expanding the apartment as per the customer's preference. Every unit is built with superior materials and modern architectural designs to provide comfortable and peaceful living environment. This complex will be consists of a shopping complex, ample car parking space for both residents and shoppers, a marvelous garden and terrace with a swimming pool on the rooftop. Glorious Residencies gives you all what you need with proud and comfortable metropolitan life style.

Amenities

· Covered Car Park
· Fully Equipped Gym
· Roof Top Garden & BBQ
· Swimming Pool (Adults & Kids)
· Kid’s Play Area
· 2 Passenger Lifts
· 2 Car Lifts
· CCTV Security System
· Reception Area with Lobby
Other Planned Features
· Mini Super Market
· Bank
· Coffee Shop
· Food Court
· Shopping Area
· Office Spaces

Please note that rate per square feet is 19,000/= in the 3rd floor and there will be a 1% increase when you select upper floors.
We do have attractive payment plan and Bank loans.
